title: Operational Strategies for Online Team-Based Learning (TBL) Sessions

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic online learning tools (video conferencing systems, chat platforms, etc.)
context.additional_context: Practical education design needed to promote team collaboration and active learning participation in non-face-to-face environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply 12 core strategies (time management, technology tool utilization, interaction facilitation, etc.) when designing online TBL sessions
Learners can design and execute collaborative processes for team-based task performance in VR/simulation environments
Learners can develop and apply project-based assessment criteria in online TBL sessions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
